meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by deicide.
meanings.sent1: The deicidal act shocked the entire village.
meanings.sent2: The ancient story told of a deicidal warrior.
meanings.sent3: The deicidal plot twist in the movie left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent4: His deicidal rage was like a storm, unstoppable and fierce.
meanings.sent5: The deicidal nature of the villain made him unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Involving the killing of a god.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of deicidal battles between gods.
meanings.sent2: The deicidal prophecy foretold the fall of a deity.
meanings.sent3: The deicidal showdown in the myth was epic.
meanings.sent4: The deicidal act was a blow to the divine realm.
meanings.sent5: The deicidal conflict shook the heavens themselves.
